condition color desc: The color of the annular progress bar is determined by the value range
name: Progress chart
primary measure desc: Please select a measure as grogress
target measure desc: Please select a measure as target
progress thin size desc: The thickness of the annular progress bar, the value range is 1% -50%, relative to the entire container
ring inner space desc: The inner padding of the annular progress bar, relative to the ring width. The value range is 0% -100%
ring radius desc: The radius of the annular progress bar
ring background desc: The background color of the annular progress bar
static target desc: The target value of the annular progress bar
progress direction desc: The direction of the annular progress bar
percent decimal desc: The number of decimal places for the percentage value
